metadata.title: CVE-2019-8955 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Tor before 0.3.3.12, 0.3.4.x before 0.3.4.11, 0.3.5.x before 0.3.5.8,and 0.4.x before 0.4.0.2-alpha, remote denial of service against Torclients and relays can occur via memory exhaustion in the KIST cellscheduler.

criterions.comment: tor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
